mapper.sql: id, img, position, name, description, salary, creat_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into excellent_student (id, img, position, name, description, salary, creat_time, update_time,if_excellent) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{ifExcellent,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into excellent_student
id,
img,
position,
name,
description,
salary,
creat_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update excellent_student
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
if_excellent=#{ifExcellent,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update excellent_student set img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select img,position,name,description,update_time from excellent_student where if_excellent=1;
